alert.note: Alert for Central Carbon County; Ferris, Seminoe, Shirley Mountains; North Snowy Range Foothills; Shirley Basin; Sierra Madre Range; Snowy Range; Southwest Carbon County; Upper North Platte River Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 1:01AM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WITH GUSTY WINDS WILL IMPACT CARBON AND WESTERN ALBANY COUNTIES THROUGH 3 AM MDT... A line of strong thunderstorms capable of producing wind gusts up to 55 MPH will track across Carbon and far western Albany Counties over the next 1 to 2 hours through 3 AM MDT. Some locations impacted include but are not limited to Baggs, Dixon, Rawlins, Muddy Gap, Saratoga, Shirley Basin, and Elk Mountain. If threatening weather approaches your area, seek shelter inside a sturdy structure until the storms pass.

area.areaDesc: Central Carbon County; Ferris, Seminoe, Shirley Mountains; North Snowy Range Foothills; Shirley Basin; Sierra Madre Range; Snowy Range; Southwest Carbon County; Upper North Platte River Basin
